title: Bug 8142 - No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: Bug 8142 - No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects. I don't understand it.
OB: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. org.apache.ant), I get the error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
EB: I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Open a binary project. 2. Select the desired project (e.g. org.apache.ant). 3. Press F4 to open the scoped type hierarchy. 4. Observe the 'No declaration of selected members' error message.
